BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO PIST_CONF_SETTLE_TRN (STR_SANC_ORDER_NO,DT_SANC_DATE,STR_APPROVAL_REQ_FROM,STR_EMPLOYEE_CODE,STR_CURRENT_BASIC,STR_PAY_SCALE, NUM_TA_CLAIMED,NUM_DA_CLAIMED,NUM_REGISTRATION_FEE,NUM_AIRPORT_TAX,NUM_VISA_FEE,NUM_APPLICATION_FEE,NUM_HLTH_INS_CHARG,NUM_TAKEN_GRANT, NUM_TOT_AMT_CLAIMED,NUM_TOT_ADV_TAKEN,NUM_NET_AMT_CLAIMED,STR_STATUS,GNUM_ISVALID,GDT_EFFECT_DATE,GDT_ENTRY_DATE,GNUM_SEAT_ID,GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,NUM_HA_CLAIMED,NUM_FA_CLAIMED,DT_ACCOM_FRM_DATE, DT_ACCOM_TO_DATE, INT_ACCOM_DAYS, DT_FOOD_FRM_DATE, DT_FOOD_TO_DATE, INT_FOOD_DAYS,INT_MAIN_SR_NO,NUM_TOT_AMT_ADMISSIBLE,NUM_NET_AMT_ADMISSIBLE,NUM_DA_CLAIMED_ADMSBL, NUM_REGISTRATION_FEE_ADMSBL, NUM_VISA_FEE_ADMSBL, NUM_HLTH_INS_CHARG_ADMSBL) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

UPDATE PIST_CONF_SETTLE_TRN T SET T.NUM_TOT_AMT_ADMISSIBLE=?,T.NUM_NET_AMT_ADMISSIBLE=?, T.STR_VERIFY_STATUS=?,T.DT_VERIFY_DATE=?,T.STR_REM_FOR_VERIFY=?,T.STR_NAME_OF_HOD=?,T.STR_BILL_NUMBER=?,T.DT_BILL_DATE=?,T.STR_STATUS=?,T.GNUM_ISVALID=?,T.GDT_EFFECT_DATE=?,T.GDT_ENTRY_DATE=?,T.GNUM_SEAT_ID=?,t.INT_MAIN_SR_NO=?,t.NUM_DA_CLAIMED_ADMSBL=?, t.NUM_REGISTRATION_FEE_ADMSBL=?, t.NUM_VISA_FEE_ADMSBL=?, t.NUM_HLTH_INS_CHARG_ADMSBL=? WHERE T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=? and T.GNUM_ISVALID=? and t.INT_MAIN_SR_NO=? and T.STR_SANC_ORDER_NO=?
UPDATE PIST_CONF_SETTLE_DTL SET NUM_AMT_ADMISSIBLE=?, STR_STATUS=?,INT_MAIN_SR_NO=? WHERE GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=? and NUM_SL_NO=? and GNUM_ISVALID=? and INT_MAIN_SR_NO=? and STR_SANC_ORDER_NO=?

UPDATE PIST_CONF_SETTLE_TRN T SET T.STR_APPROVE_SAO_STATUS=?, T.DT_APPROVE_SAO_DATE=?, T.STR_APPROVE_SAO_REMARKS=?, T.STR_APPROVE_SAO_EMP_NO=?, T.STR_APPROVE_FA_STATUS=?, T.DT_APPROVE_FA_DATE=?, T.STR_APPROVE_FA_REMARKS=?, T.STR_APPROVE_FA_EMP_NO=?, T.STR_APPROVE_DPGI_STATUS=?, T.DT_APPROVE_DPGI_DATE=?, T.STR_APPROVE_DPGI_REMARKS=?, T.STR_APPROVE_DPGI_EMP_NO=?, T.STR_STATUS=?,T.GNUM_ISVALID=?,T.GDT_EFFECT_DATE=?,T.GDT_ENTRY_DATE=?,T.GNUM_SEAT_ID=?,t.INT_MAIN_SR_NO=? WHERE T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=? and T.GNUM_ISVALID=? and t.INT_MAIN_SR_NO=? and T.STR_SANC_ORDER_NO=?

WHERE T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=? and T.GNUM_ISVALID=? and t.INT_MAIN_SR_NO=? and T.STR_SANC_ORDER_NO=?

UPDATE PIST_CONF_SETTLE_TRN T SET T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=?,T.STR_STATUS=?,T.GNUM_ISVALID=?,t.STR_REASON_NOT_RECOMMENDED=? WHERE T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=? and t.INT_MAIN_SR_NO=? and T.STR_SANC_ORDER_NO=?

UPDATE PIST_CONF_SETTLE_DTL T SET T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=?,T.STR_STATUS=?,T.GNUM_ISVALID=? WHERE T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=? and t.NUM_SL_NO=? and t.INT_MAIN_SR_NO=? and T.STR_SANC_ORDER_NO=?

UPDATE PIST_CONF_SETTLE_HOTEL_DTL T SET T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=?,T.STR_STATUS=?,T.GNUM_ISVALID=? WHERE T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=? and t.NUM_HOTEL_DAY=? and t.INT_MAIN_SR_NO=? and T.STR_SANC_ORDER_NO=?
